My hand is a perfect Flush: Ace, 7, 6, 6, and 5 of Clubs. That's a base of 80 chips and my card values add up to 35, plus 66 from the Blue Joker gives me 181.

Now, for the multipliers: My base is 10. The Gros Michel adds 15, and the Droll adds 10, which gives me a new total of 35. The Droll also multiplies that total by 1.5, and again by 1.5 because it's Polychrome, meaning my mult is going to be high. It will be 78.75.

My predicted score is 181 * 78.75 which gets me 14,253 chips, well over my remaining 9,605 chip requirement.

The question of "The Moon" comes into play with Perkeo. Perkeo will create a negative copy of a consumable at the end of the *next* shop phase. If I use "The Moon", I have zero consumables, and it loses its utility! The Moon is already negative, so I should keep it and get a copy later.

I'll put the best cards into the Flush: Ace, 7, 6, 6, 5 from positions 2, 4, 3, 5, 6, respectively. The plan is a Flush. My estimated chip count is ~14,000.

I'm checking if I should sell the egg, I don't think it is wise to do so since it gains value. As for the Jokers, their order is fine.

Let's check the Joker's order:

1: Gros Michel (+15)
2: Egg (Utility)
3: Droll (+10, x1.5)
4: Perkeo (Utility)
5: Blue Joker (+Chips)

This order is ideal. Additive multipliers are handled first, then the multiplicative effects of the Droll Joker. ((10 + 15) + 10) * 1.5 * 1.5 = 78.75.

Indices are correct. Chips calculation and multiplier calculation have been double-checked and are correct. Keeping "The Moon" means I'll be able to copy the consumable at the end of the next shop phase. Perkeo copies after a win.

Final plan: Play the Flush using cards in positions 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. Ace, 6, 7, 6, 5. The total chips are 14,253. I'm all in!

# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.
